```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false
options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.align = "center",
  out.width = "100%",
  dpi = 300,
  fig.align = "center"
)

if (!require("here")) install.packages("here")
library(here)
here::i_am("Presentation/presentation.qmd")

if (!require("renv")) install.packages("renv")
library(renv)
renv::restore(
  lockfile = here::here("renv.lock"),
  prompt = FALSE
)

if (!require("countdown")) install.packages("countdown")
library(countdown)


if (!require("jsonlite")) install.packages("jsonlite")
library(jsonlite)

if (!require("tidyverse")) install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)

if (!require("qrcode")) install.packages("qrcode")
library(qrcode)

if (!require("cropcircles")) install.packages("cropcircles")
library(cropcircles)

include_local_figure <- function(data_source) {
  knitr::include_graphics(
    path = here::here(
      "Presentation",
      "Materials",
      data_source
    ),
    error = TRUE
  )
}

source(
  here::here(
    "R/set_r_theme.R"
  )
)
```

## FOSSILPOL

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="75%" .incremental}

<br>

- Handles all the steps and flags places where the [user]{.text-highlight-purple} needs to specify their [choices]{.text-highlight-pink}
- Modular structure to allow [flexibility]{.text-highlight-coral} and [customisation]{.text-highlight-orange} for different [projects]{.text-highlight-yellow}
- Open-source and fully [reproducible]{.text-highlight-green} workflow written in [R]{.text-highlight-blue}
:::

::: {.column width="25%" .fragment}

<br>
